This seems to fit best into the "Access" category since it primarily deals with card usage and related access issues. I'll make sure to assign it correctly to streamline the processing. I think this is primarily about auditing access card usage, so I want to categorize it correctly and ensure all pertinent details are accounted for in the processing. Let’s clarify and organize the information!**Determining category for IT ticket**
